perturbation.original_text: The JVP wish to associate themselves in business of Selling a variety of Health- related products.
perturbation.changed_text: The Joint Venture Participants wish to associate themselves in the business of marketing a variety of Health- related products.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Selling' is replaced with 'marketing'. While seemingly similar, 'selling' implies a direct transaction of goods, whereas 'marketing' encompasses a broader range of activities including promotion and advertising. This creates ambiguity regarding the scope of the joint venture's intended operations.

perturbation.original_text: The principal office of the business of the Joint Venture will be located at__________________________, FL 33434 or such other place as the Participants may from time to time designate.
perturbation.changed_text: The headquarters of the business of the Joint Venture will be located at__________________________, FL 33434 or such other place as the Venture Members may from time to time designate.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'principal office' and 'headquarters' are used interchangeably, but 'headquarters' can imply a more comprehensive operational center than just a 'principal office.' Furthermore, 'Participants' is replaced by 'Venture Members,' introducing uncertainty whether these terms mean the same entities or have differing responsibilities and rights within the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: A Participant will be free of liability to the Joint Venture where the Participant is prevented from executing their obligations under this Agreement in whole or in part due to force majeure, such as earthquake, typhoon, flood, fire, and war or any other unforeseen and uncontrollable event where the Participant has communicated the circumstance of said event to any and all other Participants and taken any and all appropriate action to mitigate said event.
perturbation.changed_text: An Investor will be free of liability to the Joint Venture where the Participant is prevented from executing their obligations under this Agreement in whole or in part due to force majeure, such as earthquake, typhoon, flood, fire, and war or any other unforeseen and uncontrollable event where the Participant has communicated the circumstance of said event to any and all other Venture Members and taken any and all appropriate action to mitigate said event.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Participant' is switched to 'Investor' at the beginning of the sentence, then remains as 'Participant' later in the same sentence, creating confusion about to whom the liability exemption actually applies. Also 'Participants' is replaced with 'Venture Members'.
